message.name: ERR_FV_INTAKE_APPLICATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: An intake application must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_INTAKE_EXECUTION_ID_MANDATORY
message.locale: The intake execution ID must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_INTAKE_APPLCATION_NOT_PENDING
message.locale: Application forms can only be created for Pending intake applications.

message.name: ERR_FV_INTAKE_APPLICATION_CAN_NOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Intake application can not be modified.

message.name: ERR_FV_INTAKE_EXECUTION_ID_CAN_NOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Intake execution ID can not be modified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SUBMISSION_EXECUTION_ID_SPECIFIED_BUT_IN_PROGRESS
message.locale: The submission execution ID must not be specified if the status is In Progress.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DUPLICATE
message.locale: An application form already exists for this intake application, %1s.
